name: VxIGILANTES
description:
Mutants have been part of our history for the last 50 years. Once revered as superheroes, they are now seen as a threat and quietly kidnapped. You, however, are not a mutant; just a regular boy who saw his friends die because standing by mutants was the right choice.

However you can aid the cause coming up with strategies for the field teams and digging up where these dissapeared people are.

  • Turn-based strategy demo
  • Heroes can use one unique special ability
  • Story-based demo
  • 3D graphics
  • 10+ minutes of gameplay
KeyFunctionWASDMove the cameraLMBSelect character/actionRMBSelect place to execute action into1/2/3/4Select action (shortcut)F12Screenshot
